summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3107, for the improvement of the alley in blocks five (5) and eight A (8A), York Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue South and 37th Avenue South, from Hanford Street to York Road, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37831 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
